text: I pre-ordered the SNES mini which I'm really happy about with its great selection of games, but I wish Demon's Crest was in the lineup because of how criminally overlooked it was. It's one of the best games on the console and I love it for the same kind of reasons Super Castlevania IV is one of my favorite games ever: amazing atmosphere, great music and slick gameplay.

text: Love this game. It's almost unfortunate how many great games there are for the SNES because games like this get overlooked. Also, where did you pre order the SNES classic?
